description:
Spacious and quiet! Great location in Astoria, only a half hour from Midtown Manhattan via subway. A 10 minute walk to the M/R train. 

Right on 30th Ave, home to lots of great bars and even some clubs. Only 2 blocks away from a Key Food grocery store and across the street from a laundromat.
name: Minutes from Midtown!
review: Great place, clean and very close to the metro. Its also very close to the bars. The neighborhood was clean and safe. I highly recommend this place. The owner was super friendly and communication with him over the phone was easy and simple.
